Cotains some simul_efuns.

Inherits

Method index

strip_colours(string)
This method strips the colour codes out of the resultant string.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
strip_colours
string strip_colours(string str)
This method strips the colour codes out of the resultant string. This is used to send strings to systems outside the mud (like the web and stuff.

Parameters:
str - the string to strip
Returns:
the stripped string
